Call him the Young Master, Marshal, Brilliant Comrade or Yongmyong-Han Tongji, North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is one of a kind. From allegedly obliterating family members to executing an ex-girlfriend to killing a deputy with mortars — not to mention nuclear proliferation — Kim makes sure he continues to North Korea 's absolute master. As he meets US President Donald Trump on June 12, ET Magazine checks out Kim's reign as a leader.* Kim is the first North Korean leader to be born after the country's founding in 1948.* He may be the youngest world leader, but no one is sure of his actual age. Some say he was born in either 1982, 1983 or 1984* At 27, he underwent plastic surgery to allegedly resemble his grandfather Kim Il Sung* At 29, the Onion announced him as the “Sexiest Man Alive” for the year 2012.* Onion is a satirical news source, so we can figure* When his father passed away, he made sure his death was grieved wholeheartedly by North Koreans. Those who didn’t go to the mourning events were reportedly being sentenced to labour camps for six months.* At the demise of his grandfather Kim Il Sung, his father Kim Jong Il made sure that the country grieved massively* Members of the Moranbong Band, were specially hand-picked by the Kim to form North Korea's first-ever all-female band. The quintet made their debut in 2012* The Interview, a 2014 American action-comedy film stars Seth Rogen and James Franco as journalists who set up an interview with Kim Jong Un, and are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him* The North Korean government threatened action against the US if Columbia Pictures released the film. Columbia delayed the release and re-edited the film to make it more acceptable to North Korea.* In November, the computer systems of parent company Sony Pictures Entertainment were hacked by the "Guardians of Peace", a group the FBI claims has ties to North Korea. The group also threatened terrorist attacks against cinemas that showed the film. Major cinema chains opted not to release the film, leading Sony to release it for online rental* His haircut is very popular in the country and even has a name — Ambitious. Male university students were asked to copy his haircut.
